channel.title: Warcraft 3: TFT
channel.description: Does anybody play it? My computer specs are abit on the low side so I just play low end games like war3 and its quite fun. I will get a new computer next year Probably an overspecced laptop or something. Maybe i will get a gift macbook pro. IDK (dual booting either way/idc) Anyways I use garena as a ext source of server for the game since i dont have the official copy? Anybody Play? would anyone play with me?

item.title: Warcraft 3: TFT
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

The game that defined my childhood! Sadly I don’t play anymore because I don’t have the time to pick up any more video games
